block_02: Your guide to spotting trend reversals
block_03: In trading, timing is key. These diamond chart patterns could provide the quick trading signals you’ve been waiting for. All you need to do is figure out if it’s a diamond top or a diamond bottom you’re seeing on the chart.
block_04: Once you do that, everything else will become crystal clear. You’ll be able to predict upcoming trend reversals in time to make a move and beat the market. Keep reading to find out how to catch diamond patterns and use them to your advantage.
